recipe.title: Green Salad with Mustard-Herb Vinaigrette
ingredients: 2 tablespoons finely chopped mixed fresh herbs such as chives, tarragon, and parsley
1 head Boston lettuce (1/2 lb), leaves separated and torn into bite-size pieces
instructions: Whisk together vinegar, mustard, and broth in a large bowl, then add oil in a stream, whisking until emulsified. Season with salt and pepper and whisk in mixed herbs.
Add lettuce and toss with vinaigrette.
